Package org.owasp.esapi.http

A few simple mock classes to help test the ESAPI reference implementation.

MockFilterChain  
MockFilterConfig A filter configuration object used by a servlet container to pass information to a filter during initialization.

MockHttpServletResponse The Class MockHttpServletResponse.
MockHttpSession The Class MockHttpSession.
MockRequestDispatcher  
MockServletContext Defines a set of methods that a servlet uses to communicate with its servlet container, for example, to get the MIME type of a file, dispatch requests, or write to a log file.
MockServletInputStream  
 

Package org.owasp.esapi.http Description

A few simple mock classes to help test the ESAPI reference implementation. These classes are not fully functional and only implement the functions required to test the library. These implementations are not fully accurate and may not behave like the real Java EE classes.
